sentences.en: Add it all up and you get this otherworldly, desolate feeling.
sentences.cn: 购买了这一切,你会得到这种空想的, 凄凉的感觉.

sentences.en: Change the belief, measure out each with care and you can create otherworldly violet.
sentences.cn: 改变信仰, 精心量取,你可以用红与蓝调和成非凡的紫罗兰色.

sentences.en: He paints an otherworldly , murky scene of dread in the cemetery where lightening flashes and thunderroars.
sentences.cn: 他把墓地描写得阴森恐怖,不时伴有电闪雷鸣.

sentences.en: Otherworldly Whispers: Gain bonus on Knowledge checks.
sentences.cn: 异世呢喃: 在知识检定上获得加值.

sentences.en: Swimming among these graceful sea creatures is a truly otherworldly experience.
sentences.cn: 与这些优雅的海底生物共游绝对是超凡的美妙体验.

sentences.en: The otherworldly contours of this ice chamber were formed by the heat of a geothermal spring.
sentences.cn: 该超俗的轮廓这冰库形成了由于地热的泉水.

sentences.en: They encourage an image of the region as an otherworldly sort of place.
sentences.cn: 他们想将这个地区打造成世外桃源。

sentences.en: This is not narcissism, but an otherworldly realm of life.
sentences.cn: 这不是自我陶醉, 而是一种超凡脱俗的人生境界.

words.tran_cn: 来世；冥间；理想世界；空想

trans.tran_cn: 非现实世界的，超世俗的，超自然的
trans.tran_en: Otherworldly people, things, and places seem strange or spiritual, and not much connected with ordinary things
